bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jiu zha 酒齇 , wine sediments. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Zang fu xu shi biao ben yong yao shi 脏腑虚实标本用药式 ( wei 胃 ) ：标病：发热蒸蒸，身前 热，身前寒，发狂谵语，咽痹，上齿痛，口眼喎斜，鼻痛鼽衄赤㾴 , “Its external diseases: effusion of heat with steaming. The body’s front is [at times] hot; the body’s front is [at times] cold. [Patients] are mad and their speech is incoherent. They have a throat blockage, and the upper teeth ache. Mouth and eyes are slanted. The nose aches, with runny nose, nosebleed and red sediments ”.
